DOC.brief_summary: The aim study determine efficacy clonidine propranolol transient anxiety management intra postoperative pain patient undergo ambulatory surgery third molar .
DOC.detailed_description: There randomize , triple-blind , placebo-controlled clinical trial parallel group design determine efficacy pre medication propranolol clonidine versus placebo reduce anxiety third molar removal surgery . Patients assign 3 group 20 patient . One group receive 150 mcg clonidine , second group receive propranolol 40mg , control group receive placebo . The modified dental anxiety scale apply surgery order evaluate change anxiety level , assessed primary outcome . The secondary outcome include measurement change blood pressure , heart rate respiratory rate evaluate , surgery . Additionally , pain assess numerical pain scale 3 , 6 24 hour surgery . Also , possible side effect identify ( vomit , nausea , dry mouth , dizziness drowsiness ) . Statistical analysis : qualitative variable describe absolute relative frequency , quantitative variable describe mean along standard deviation median interquartile range depend distribution data . One-way ANOVA Kruskal Wallis use ( depend fulfillment assumption ) order compare quantitative variable amongst group . The chi square test use compare qualitative variable . The confidence interval estimate 95 % effect magnitude measurement calculate .
DOC.criteria: Normotensive patient prehypertension undergo elective surgery removal third molar . Age range 14 40 year Patients dental anxiety 13 point scale ( MDAS ) . People voluntarily agree participate study sign inform consent form Patients receive medication chronic pathology . Patients African American race , likely abnormal blood pressure . Patients history cardiovascular disease . Patients chronic systemic disease diabetes , hyper hypothyroidism , Addison 's syndrome , renal failure , hypertension liver disease .
